sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import axios from 'axios';

export default function OptionsForm({handleAudioCheckBox, handleQuickPickUpCheckBox, handleReservationPeriodChange, handleSubmit}){
    <form className="form" onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
    <label className='txt'>
        Audio Book
        <input type="checkbox" checked={isAudioBook} onChange={handleAudioCheckBox}/>
    </label>

    <label className='txt'>
        Quick pick up
        <input type="checkbox" checked={isQuickPickUp} onChange={handleQuickPickUpCheckBox} readOnly={isAudioBook}/>
    </label>

    <label className='txt'>
        Reservation period
        <input type="date" value={reservationPeriod} onChange={handleReservationPeriodChange} min={today}/>
    </label>

    <button className="btn btn-submit" type="submit">Submit</button>
</form>
}
